Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.abstract: Removes the specified keys. A key is ignored if it does not exist.

Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.name: delete(_:)
Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.abstract: Removes the specified keys. A key is ignored if it does not exist.

Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.name: expire(_:after:)
Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.abstract: Set a timeout on key. After the timeout has expired, the key will automatically be deleted.

Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.name: mget(_:)

Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.name: increment(_:by:)

Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.name: decrement(_:by:)
Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.abstract: Decrements the number stored at key by one or a specified amount.

Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.name: lrange(list:range:)
Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.abstract: Returns the specified elements of the list stored at key.

Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.name: rpush(_:into:)

Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.name: length(of:)

Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.name: lSet(_:at:in:)

Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.name: rPop(_:)
Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.abstract: Removes and returns the last element of the list stored at key.

Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.name: rpoplpush(source:destination:)
Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.abstract: Atomically returns and removes the last element (tail) of the list stored at source,

Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.abstract: Select the Redis logical database having the specified zero-based numeric index.

Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.abstract: Subscribes to the channels and call the subscription handler on message from server

Classes/RedisClient.html#/s:5Redis0A6Cli.abstract: Connects to a Redis server using a TCP socket.

Classes/RedisProvider.html.abstract: Provides base Redis services such as database and connection.
